name: Greatsword
description: A long, sturdy blade forged from resilient steel. Its weight delivers powerful strikes, ideal for overwhelming foes with raw power.

name: Mana Potion
description: A crystalline potion that restores a moderate amount of mana upon drinking.

name: Health Potion
description: A rosy elixir that heals wounds and replenishes vitality when consumed.

name: Battle Axe
description: A heavy axe that delivers brutal chops at the cost of slower recovery between swings.

name: Shortbow
description: A simple bow that allows you to strike from a distance without the need to move.

name: Throwing Knife
description: A balanced knife that you can hurl in a single text command to hit distant targets.

name: Antidote
description: A bitter liquid that neutralizes common poisons and toxins when ingested.

name: Strength Elixir
description: A potent brew that increases physical strength and damage output instantly.

name: Crystal Wand
description: A slender wand tipped with a glowing crystal. Enhances magical attacks in a single cast.

name: Fire Arrow
description: An arrow imbued with fire magic. Ignites the target on impact.

name: Ice Shard
description: A shard of magically frozen water. Chills and slows enemies upon contact.

name: Bandage
description: A simple cloth wrap that stops bleeding and heals minor cuts instantly.
